item.title: Trump campaign email says he is 'safe and well' after shots fired at Florida golf club
item.description: U.S. Secret Service offices fired shots at a person they believed was aiming a weapon outside the fence line of Donald Trump's golf course in Florida.

item.title: "I'm Glad He's Safe": Kamala Harris After Shots Fired In Trump's Vicinity
item.description: Shots were fired from an AK-47-style rifle in former US President Donald Trump's vicinity on the grounds of his golf course in Palm Beach Florida, where he was present.

item.title: Trump Safe After Shooting At His Golf Course, AK-47 Found In Bushes
item.description: Donald Trump is safe following gunshots in his vicinity, the Republican presidential candidate's team said today. "President Trump is safe following gunshots in his vicinity.

item.title: Trump ‘safe’ after Secret Service opens fire at suspect with firearm near golf club
item.description:
Conflicting reports about whether ex-president was target of reported gunshots at Florida Trump National Golf Club

US Secret Service agents opened fire after seeing a person with a firearm near Donald Trump’s golf club in West Palm Beach, Florida, while the Republican presidential candidate was golfing Sunday, two law enforcement officials told the Associated Press.

Trump was safe after the gunshots were fired, his campaign said in a statement on Sunday. The campaign said no further details were available.

Continue reading...

item.title: Trump ‘safe’ after gunshots reported at his golf course – follow live
item.description:
Incident occurred at Trump National Golf Club in West Palm Beach, Florida, where ex-president was playing

Officials are set to deliver a press conference soon on the shooting incident.

Stay tuned as we bring you the latest updates.
